full_description:
PC Power 650VA Offline UPS

The PC Power 650VA Offline UPS is a reliable and effective backup power solution for the home or office. It has a 650V volt-ampere (VA) rating and can power equipment such as PCs, routers, and printers. When mains power fails or fluctuates, it automatically switches to battery power. The UPS offers a 100-270V input voltage range, a 220V 5% output voltage, and a frequency of 50/60Hz. It features a built-in 12V/7Ah battery that provides backup power for 10-15 minutes, depending on the load. The battery is rechargeable and has a long service life. The PC Power 650VA Offline UPS contains an LED indicator that displays input voltage, output voltage, battery level, and load level, as well as an audio alert for low battery, overload, or fault circumstances. The UPS includes a strong, compact metal casing, several outlets, and fuse protection to avoid short circuits and overloads. PC Power 650VA Offline UPS is simple to set up and operate, with a plug-and-play design and a manual switch.
